EmailTemplate.name: RE: Turbo 5.9 Release and controlling cloud costs (1498571545.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Turbo 5.9 Release and controlling cloud costs (1498571545.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Jay, Following up on the email below, I wanted to see if there is any interest in learning more about Turbonomic and how our platform not only allows you to control workloads in the cloud, but also delivers the same control around each workload on premise. Our bread and butter is allowing our customers to gain more control over their virtualized on premise workloads through demand driven automation, enabling customers to increase the performance of their on-premise workloads while also increasing the efficiency of their infrastructure as a whole. Below is a video where the BMC CIO, Scott Crowder and his team explain the value that he sees in Turbonomic after implementing the platform into their internal infrastructure. With Turbonomic, they were able to increase the capacity of their infrastructure by 25% while “performance went through the roof”. Cloud Economics with BMC | A Turbonomic Success Story <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5YdMHJKVxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAk%2DhTzTtlKmUf4xCfLFh%5FNdo66m2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXYpwghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSdql6620%5Fo2wCUGGVUsPjJ00iSKKxzoeRQtnh20UkKStmjzS%5FukYUomHUC%2DNkltBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DOOR%5Ftjmim25gVMk7QhiekStxkXkj4qRT96qothamPH%5FrCHXzoh2N0QuIA9A7kUbDmNIV4hDgCw7vyMFza3L0BPPsjlS0YcnUvnIVE6EPG4Y%2C/j01QeM3JL1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwMot1l1scencd1fmjNZeD90xaeaLBU8VEJ9vzwFRGfPYc44N6udYBgy9SnbwhqeXeIRaeflnydNj8Kaq1WkG59%2DPkROTBEQaf2Vjb1vPcYoBrwftE5UvVzuX9lmUcNUBmSE6h5EKxZmxd5W113rlp2bV%5FT3WE0Nz6JKYwGmvFbBfvP4As3QjrQMCOLPS]]> Do you have 30 minutes for my team and I to provide an introduction to see if this could be possible for you and the team at City of Fort Lauderdale? Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Thursday, June 15, 2017 10:21 AM To: 'jstacy@fortlauderdale.gov' <jstacy@fortlauderdale.gov> Subject: Turbo 5.9 Release and controlling cloud costs Jay – Unfortunately, my team and I have never gotten the chance to introduce Turbonomic to you and the team at City of Fort Lauderdale. I was hoping that with the new additional capabilities in the 5.9 release there would be some interest in seeing how Turbonomic can provide value to you and your team. Typically our customers face visibility challenges when moving to the public cloud, only having in-region visibility, have difficulty correlating a VM to the resources it consume and the cost for the resources are not visible ANYWHERE. Because AWS has 16 regions, 70 templates or so on each and 7 storage options > 7,000 options and Azure has 29 regions, 40 template on each and 4 storage options > 4,000 options it can be very challenging to choose the right template and the right region for every migrated workload out of the available options. Turbonomic’s 5.9 answers all of the questions for you and your team and can give: • Accurate demand-based instance decision, based on real-time and historical full stack visibility• Avoid the high costs of allocation-based overprovisioning • Full stack visibility from a simple non-intrusive discovery process• Accelerate hardware decommissioning by optimizing your on-prem environment during migration• Accelerate Cloud Migration/Adoption• Real-Time performance actions• Rightsizing for performance (within and across instance families)• Pre-paid capacity recommendations 5.9 Webinar Release <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jE1ZcMDLKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhNDlWgQS%5F3oKLVY4FHdKZg38lu8KS2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXY5wghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYew8UmUz0z85jbcGGVc%5Fu%2DWw0iSKJ1hoeRR628QwUkKStL6zgHmkYUviHYBwsEmty8%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmgk21YUPMefBidnxhxnT4j25oM96%5FahQa3RijpMgaumyev2za5C7AA5VKHsvga8yneEBrD28oweGT8U6uZ6gg%2C/j0lYd8fJLFlNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpxscmlF98fP6CLFT9itxfE587ZqTLTFtdAZVtxQ1LH62CeYJJ9PRPRB6%5FUy%5FAlK7RMt9WRJVY5stC%5FvmX9nBU%5F9TWy0XNJU42SH1mQDWcU6onkBHJKLcxUQ%5FU%2DVH0Jp4KqQ8hhLEx0df4Wfbn3w%2C%2C]]> We do all of this while optimizing your on-premise infrastructure through our workload automation. Do you have 30 minutes for my engineer and I to explain how this is possible on a 30 minute WebEx? Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jE5RccTPK1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhXGFWzWyLfhq7Ie4FPZLB2zsVg863r328T7MiLlgGcT0oWVGNtOSupWO4mrBP%2DCcIvVDOz0ynsL4N7nh8ulb8j2pmbSobgwXmrpn7M5y2iAHBk3duc%5FnKYD8pEqIYIknYN8HwSfrXMxwPO7Igc%2Dwsx%5FvVZrkx22PZfc89P2gqLDHS65YLeW9JWb6C2wu7hha9wOy8fudQtdkTHK1bqG4uvVDdIo0qYkB0WYAJjKWlsIdk3qx3dulVpI74nYAq4mg4VzGxz4K9g6dzzmAi%5FfnrkDTn88wi4yjj1J6gl7GeQyOkrzA35JwC9zfVKcmT8U7CZ6g%2C%2C/j0lYdsHJIllNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwt0x3V19ZqOQNUr7t8deF89gfdy%5FKjgaMJNU6iJMP9KDZcUS3ORqJm3hUDX2pITcO5xdZKZRiPMkrY6ByHgunOiRi3X5LmYPTERrIVW5LOwExzHoJ5UxEgqJ%5FGnAJpMxiSsckK8Bm5Gkbqen]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jE5RccTPK1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhXGFWzWyLfhq7Ie4FPZLB2zsVg863r328T7MiLlgGcT0oWVGNtOSupWO4mrBP%2DCcIvVDOz0ynsL4N7nh8ulb8j2pmbSobgwXmrpn7M5y2iAHBk3duc%5FnKYD8pEqIYIknYN8HwSfrXMxwPO7Igc%2Dwsx%5FvVZrkx22PZfc89P2gqLDHS65YLeW9JWb6C2wu7hha9wOy8fudQtdkTHK1bqG4uvVDdIo0qYkB0WYAJjKWlsIdk3qx3dulVpI74nYAq4mg4VzGxz4K9g6dzzmAi%5FfnrkDTn88wi4yjj1J6gl7GeQyOkrzA35JwC9zfVKcmT8U7CZ6g%2C%2C/h05TcMbLdlBQuVN5sfaYL6z%2D0SLJdpuno5xpHOXk3cEx1EF9PO%5FANR7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpCwzlyNPSwTpZZv6d7GnafdGj3jqj%2DSosaYKdmzuM1ze33%5FkQVsva0p0%5FVIHopaXBgUQHYOptl1xk%2C]]>
